name: Tales of a Turnabout
summary: It's been a few years since the Underground opened up. Humans and monsters have been living, for the most part, relatively peacefully. However, there are still some tensions between the two groups. Namely, the existence of a serial killer who seeks to wipe out the monsters. In these desperate times, one skeleton seeks to become an "Attorney Ace" and defend humans to the best of his ability. Nyeh heh heh!
